characters.name: Yoichi Isagi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 175 cm (5'9")

Second-year high school student at Ichinan High School in Saitama. Isagi grew up watching soccer and aspiring to be like Noel Noa, a forward for France's National Team.  Due to this, he dreams of becoming the best striker in the world. In turn, Isagi played striker for his school soccer team, who was defeated in the Prefectural Finals by Matsukaze Kokou High. After this loss, Isagi is invited to participate in the Blue Lock Project, ranked 299th of 300 strikers, and is assigned to Team Z.

Isagi is easygoing and has a generally friendly, cheery personality, but his simple and innocent habits often get on the nerves of the people around him. As time goes on, Isagi develops a more assertive presence on and off the field, becoming the foundation for Team Z and garnering the respect of some of the best players in Blue Lock.

characters.name: Seishirou Nagi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 190cm (6'3")

Contender for the Blue Lock Project. He attends Hakuho High School alongside Reo Mikage. As a striker, Nagi's perfect ball control, flexible movements, and technical ability allow him to breathe life into even the most difficult or hopeless plays.

Nagi is a very lazy and unmotivated person with an outstanding aptitude for football. He's unnaturally talented, with amazing reflexes, good speed, and jumping skills. He has no interest in going pro or even playing at all at first. As long as he can get a decent job and keep living a lax life, he is content with doing nothing forever and often appears lethargic in his speech and body language. Introverted to a fault, he lives by himself in an apartment his parents pay for with only a pet cactus for company.

characters.name: Rin Itoshi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 186 cm (6'1")

First-year high school student and contender for the Blue Lock Project. He is the younger brother of Sae Itoshi, a prodigy considered one of the best youth soccer players in the world. Rin once had the aspiration of being the greatest in the world alongside his brother, but after a disagreement, he became obsessed with beating his brother in football to demonstrate he can succeed without him.

Rin is a player who loves to play perfectly efficient football but isn’t hesitant to be daring and take surprising risks to fully embrace the live-or-die attitude he has grown fond of and appreciates. Whether on offense or defense, Rin's play style consists of him grasping the abilities of both his teammates and his opponents and forcing out their best plays and abilities. He either manipulates them in his efforts to score goals for himself or aims to crush them at their strongest.

characters.name: Jinpachi Ego
characters.description:
__Height:__ 189 cm (6'2")

General Director/Manager of the Blue Lock Project, handpicked to lead the project by Anri Teieri. Ego is introduced as a man who radiates ambition and confidence. His egotistical nature is undeniable, especially given his belief that only his methods can lead to Japan's victory in the World Cup.

characters.name: Hyouma Chigiri
characters.description:
__Height:__ 177cm (5'10")

Hyoma Chigiri is a contender for the Blue Lock Project and member of Team Z. As a young child, he was thought of as a prodigy due to his incredible speed. However, he is now psychologically scarred by a life-changing injury during his first year of high school.

characters.name: Meguru Bachira
characters.description:
__Birthplace:__ Chiba
__Height:__ 176 cm (5'9")

Meguru Bachira is a contender in the Blue Lock Project who currently plays as a center forward for Spain’s FC Barcha during the Neo Egoist League. Bachira is a whimsical forward who plays instinctively.

characters.name: Rensuke Kunigami
characters.description:
__Height:__ 188 cm
__Team:__ Team Z

Rensuke Kunigami is very serious about his football career and training; he's always the first in the training room in the morning and the last to leave at night. Kunigami tends to get into arguments with Raichi, but is also the one who restrains him the most when he picks a fight with someone.

~! During the second selection Kunigami is eliminated from Blue Lock project, but afterwards gets a second chance through the Wild Card training !~

~! After Blue Lock vs. Japan U20 match, Kunigami gets back into Blue Lock project. His appearance changed a bit and his attitude too. !~

characters.name: Reo Mikage
characters.description:
**Height:** 185 cm

Reo Mikage is the heir of the Mikage Corporation. Prior to entering Blue Lock, he was a student at an elite high school, the same school as Seishiro Nagi.

characters.name: Shouei Barou
characters.description: __Height:__ 187 cm

characters.name: Sae Itoshi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 180 cm (5'11")

Sae Itoshi is regarded as the best player in Japan and is [Rin Itoshi](https://anilist.co/character/169395/Rin-Itoshi)'s older brother. He is a member of Real Madrid’s youth team and is regarded as one of the best youth players in the world.

characters.name: Anri Teieri
characters.description:
__Height:__ 157cm (5'2")

Anri is a new member of the Japan Football Association. Sometime after the defeat of the Japanese National Team in the 2018 World Cup, Anri proposes the Blue Lock plan to the executives of the Japan Football Union to help Japan win the World Cup.

characters.name: Ryousuke Kira
characters.description:
Previously a second year football player at Matsukaze Kokuo High and now #289 in Blue Lock. He is a pretty boy with girls swooning over him. He plays as a striker and, like Yoichi, is a team-based player.

Ryousuke is skeptical about the whole Blue Lock program and is against the thought of an ego-driven striker. Due to this, he is trying to defeat all 299 other strikers at Blue Lock.
~!He is kicked out of Blue Lock after being defeated by Yoichi and Meguru.!~

characters.name: Yudai Imamura
characters.description:
__Birthplace:__ Tokushima Prefecture
__Height:__ 178 cm (5'10")
__Team:__ Team Z

Yudai Imamura is a contender in the Blue Lock Project.

characters.name: Gurimu Igarashi
characters.description: __Height:__ 175 cm

characters.name: Jingo Raichi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 184 cm
__Team:__ Team Z

Raichi is the most hot-headed of the group and argues with just about everyone on everything, often to the point of needing to be restrained by Kunigami.

characters.name: Gin Gagamaru
characters.description:
__Height:__ 191 cm

Gagamaru was a forward who aspired to be the best in the world, along with the others of Blue Lock. When first arriving at Blue Lock, he was a member of Team Z during the First Selection.

characters.name: Zantetsu Tsurugi
characters.description:
__Birthplace:__ Saitama Prefecture
__Height:__ 187 cm (6'2")

Zantetsu Tsurugi is a contender in the Blue Lock Project. ~!He was a member of Team V during the First Selection and remained among the selected contenders after the Second Selection. Known for his simplicity and remarkable speed, he played as a right winger for France’s Paris X Gen during the Neo Egoist League. Following the conclusion of the 5th round, he was ranked 19th overall and qualified as one of the 23 players selected for the U-20 World Cup.!~

characters.name: Asahi Naruhaya
characters.description:
__Height:__ 171 cm
__Team:__ Team Z

Naruhaya is the youngest member of Team Z and is always seen stealing food from Gin.

~!During the Second Selection Naruhaya teams up with Barou, but loses in a 2v2 match against Isagi and Nagi, and is eliminated from Blue Lock!~

characters.name: Ryuusei Shidou
characters.description:
__Birthplace:__ Tokyo
__Height:__ 185 cm (6'1")

Ryuusei Shidou is a contender in the Blue Lock Project. ~!He was ranked #2 during the Third Selection and was initially chosen as the wildcard for the Blue Lock Eleven in their match against Japan’s U-20 team, but was instead selected by Itoshi Sae to play for the U-20 side. He later stood out as one of the top players in the project. During the Neo Egoist League, he played as a center forward for France’s Paris X Gen. Following the conclusion of the 5th round, he was ranked 3rd overall and qualified as one of the 23 players for the new Japan U-20 team.!~

characters.name: Eita Otoya
characters.description:
__Birthplace:__ Aichi
__Height:__ 177 cm (5'10")

Eita Otoya is a contender in the Blue Lock Project. ~!When first introduced, he was ranked #4 during the Third Selection and later played both right wing and right-back for the Blue Lock Eleven in their match against Japan’s U-20 team. He played as a right winger for Spain’s FC Barcha during the Neo Egoist League.!~

characters.name: Tabito Karasu
characters.description:
__Birthplace:__ Osaka
__Height:__ 183 cm (6'0")

Tabito Karasu is a contender in the Blue Lock Project. ~!He played as a central midfielder for France’s Paris X Gen during the Neo Egoist League. When first introduced, he was ranked #3 during the Third Selection and later played as a defensive midfielder for the Blue Lock Eleven in their match against Japan’s U-20 team.!~

characters.name: You Hiori
characters.description:
__Height:__ 183 cm (6'0")

Hiori Yo one of friends that Isagi made before Third Selection begins

characters.name: Nanase  Nijirou
characters.description:
__Height:__ 178 cm (5'10")

Nananse Nijirou is one of friends that Isagi made before Third Selection begins

characters.name: Kyouhei Shiguma
characters.description: One of the players Isagi played aganist in Third Selection.

characters.name: Kenyu Yukimiya
characters.description:
__Team:__ Team C; 3rd Clear Team (formerly); Blue Lock 11 (Left Wing)
__Position:__ Forward; Winger

He is currently ranked #5 out of the original 300 forwards chosen to be apart of the Blue Lock Project ~!and is currently starting as a winger for the Blue Lock Eleven team against the Japan U-20.!~

Yukimiya is highly confident in his own abilities, declaring himself the strongest player in Japan, when it comes to one-on-one battles. He is also a likable and charismatic personality, appearing to make friends easily, like with Nagi. In addition to this, Yukimiya likes to make banter even with his opponents, indicating a playful element to his personality.

Yukimiya claims that he is a pacifist, which forms part of his ego, since he sees the easiest and most peaceful way to score would be to do so himself. He is also inquisitive, often being the first to ask questions of Ego, about his selection criteria.

characters.name: Ranze Kurona
characters.description:
__Height:__ 168 cm (5'6")
__Team:__ Bastard München (NEL)
__Position:__ Wingback, Forward

Ranze Kurona is a participant of the Blue Lock project and plays for Bastard München during the Neo Egoist League. He typically plays as a post-player who can be easily utilized to exchange possession in the instance [Isagi](https://anilist.co/character/140856/Yoichi-Isagi) gets pressured.

characters.name: Alexis Ness
characters.description:
__Height:__ 181 cm (5'11")
__Team:__ Bastard München
__Position:__ Offensive Midfielder

Alexis Ness is the center midfielder and beating heart of the Bastard München U20s team, Ness' ability to dribble and pass are heavily relied on as all of [Kaiser's](https://anilist.co/character/268963/Michael-Kaiser) shots are started with Ness, and in turn, every Bastard Münchens play.

characters.name: Kairu  Saramadara
characters.description: One of the players Isagi played aganist in Third Selection.

characters.name: Oliver Aiku
characters.description:
__Birthplace:__ Stockholm, Sweden
__Height:__ 190 cm (6'2")
__Team:__ Japan U20 & ~!Ubers (NEL)!~
__Position:__ Center Back

Oliver Aiku is the captain and center-back of the Japan U-20 team.

characters.name: Michael Kaiser
alt_names: ミヒャエル カイザー
characters.description:
__Birthplace:__ Berlin, Germany
__Height:__ 186 cm (6'1")

Michael Kaiser is a prodigy U-20 forward from Germany who plays for Bastard München during the Neo Egoist League as the team's ace and main striker. Kaiser is regarded as a prodigy and is also a member of the New Generation World XI

characters.name: Kazuma Niou
characters.description:
__Height:__ 184cm

Center Back for the Japan U-20 team.

characters.name: Noel Noa
characters.description:
He is a 31-year old forward from France who plays on France's National Team and on the German club team Bastard München. Noa is known as the best striker in the world and he is Yoichi Isagi's idol.

He is initially introduced at the beginning of the series but he officially makes his debut in the Neo Egoist League when he comes to Blue Lock as the master striker/coach of the Germany Stratum.

characters.name: Chris Prince
characters.description:
**Affiliation:** England
**Team:** England Manshine City
**Position:** Forward

characters.name: Julian Loki
characters.description:
__Team:__ Paris X Gen, France National Team, Team World Five (Former)
__Position:__ Forward

Julian Loki is a young French football prodigy renowned for his exceptional speed and skill. He plays as a forward for the French club Paris X Gen (PXG) and is also a member of the France National Team.

First introduced during Third Selection, as a member of the Team World 5, he is initially at Blue Lock to analyze and rate the last string of Blue Lock players. He later returns to help train the Blue Lock players and participate in the Neo Egoist League as the master striker and coach of the France Stratum, all in order to train his protégé, [Charles Chevalier](https://anilist.co/character/334890/Charles-Chevalier), into becoming his personal passer so they may become the best in the world together. ~!He is a member of the New Generation World XI.!~

characters.name: Ravinho
characters.description: Ravinho is an eccentric forward from Brazil who plays on Spain's FC Barcha.

characters.name: Junichi Wanima
alt_names: The Twin Pillars of Rakoste Vocational High School
characters.description:
__Birthplace:__ Kagoshima Prefecture
__Height:__ 182 cm (6'0")

Junichi Wanima is a contender in the Blue Lock Project and the older twin brother of [Keisuke Wanima](https://anilist.co/character/284965).

characters.name: Keisuke Wanima
characters.description: Younger twin brother of [Junichi Wanima](https://anilist.co/character/284964).

characters.name: Hirotoshi Buratsuta
characters.description: The man who serves as the chairman of the Japan Football Association. He sees soccer as a business and doesn't really think about helping the Japanese national team win The World Cup. He is also skeptical of the "Blue Lock" project.

characters.name: Dada Silva
characters.description:
__Jersey Number:__ 5
__Position:__ Forward

A member of Team World 5. Silva currently plays for Brazi's National Football Team.

characters.name: Benedict Grim
alt_names: ベネディクト・グリム
characters.description: Benedict Grim is a U-20 forward from Germany who plays for Bastard München during the Neo Egoist League.

characters.name: Don Lorenzo
characters.description:
__Height:__ 190 cm (6'3)

A prodigy U-20 defender from Italy who plays for Ubers during the Neo Egoist League as the team's core and star defender. He is a member of the New Generation World XI and is known as "The Ace Eater."

characters.name: Agi
characters.description: U-20 forward from England who plays for Manshine City and participates in Blue Lock during the Neo Egoist League.

characters.name: Leonardo Luna
characters.description: Professional player from Spain known as 'The Scion of Real Madrid' who plays on Spain's Real Madrid and the Spain National Team. He arrives at Blue Lock as member of the Team World 5 to analyze and rate the last string of Blue Lock players.

characters.name: Pablo Cabassos
characters.description: Member of the Team World 5. Pablo currently plays for Argentina's National Football Team.

characters.name: Yukio Ishikari
characters.description: A contender for the Blue Lock Project, known as the tallest high school soccer athlete in Japan.

characters.name: Shingen Tanaka
characters.description: A contender for the Blue Lock Project. Ranked 5th after the third selection.

characters.name: Shizuka Haiji
characters.description: A contender for the Blue Lock Project.

characters.name: Taiga Tsunzaki
characters.description: Contender of the Blue Lock Project.

characters.name: Reiji Hiiragi
characters.description: Contender for the Blue Lock Project.

characters.name: Tetsu Sokura
characters.description: Contender for the Blue Lock Project.

characters.name: Jin Kiyora
characters.description:
__Height:__ 165cm

Contender for the Blue Lock Project. Plays for Bastard München during the Neo Egoist League

characters.name: Hajime Nishioka
characters.description: Contender for the Blue Lock Project. He makes it to the third selection, but is mentioned as being treated for an injury sustained during the World's Select Battle and is not introduced with the rest of his team.

characters.name: Marc Snuffy
alt_names: マルク・スナッフィー
characters.description: Marc Snuffy is a professional football player who plays as a forward for Italy’s Ubers. He participates in the Blue Lock Project’s Neo Egoist League as the master striker and coach of the Italy stratum.

characters.name: Charles Chevalier
alt_names: シャルル・シュバリエ
characters.description:
Charles Chevalier is a midfielder who plays for Paris X Gen and participates in Blue Lock during the Neo Egoist League.

Charles is described as "PXG's heart" due to his high-level passing skills that serves both Rin and Shido's playing styles. Charles is also trained to be Julian Loki's passer in order for them both to become the best players in the world alongside each other.

characters.name: Shuuto Sendou
characters.description: Member of the Japan U-20 team.

characters.name: Seiji Houichi
characters.description: Manager of the Japan U-20 team. He was hired by Hirotoshi, the current chairman of the Japan Football Union.

characters.name: Gen Fukaku
characters.description:
__Height:__ 191 cm

Goalkeeper for the Japan U-20 team. He currently plays for Italy's Ubers during the Neo Egoist League.

characters.name: Kento Chou
characters.description:
__Height__: 193 cm

Member of the Japan U-20.

characters.name: Teru Kitsunezato
characters.description:
__Height:__ 181 cm

Right wing for the Japan U-20 team.

characters.name: Itsuki Wakatsuki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 178 cm

Defensive midfielder for the Japan U-20 team.

characters.name: Haru Hayate
characters.description:
__Height:__ 186 cm

Defensive midfielder for the Japan U-20 team.

characters.name: Miroku Darai
characters.description:
__Height:__ 179 cm

Left back for the Japan U-20 team.

characters.name: Teppei Neru
characters.description:
__Height:__ 168 cm

Right back for the Japan U-20 team.

characters.name: Neneko Chigiri
characters.description: Mother of Hyouma Chigiri.

characters.name: Koyuki Chigiri
characters.description: Older sister of Hyouma Chigiri.

characters.name: Issei Isagi
characters.description: Father of [Yoichi Isagi](https://anilist.co/character/140856)

characters.name: Iyo Isagi
characters.description: Mother of [Yoichi Isagi](https://anilist.co/character/140856/)

characters.name: Ray Dark
characters.description: President of PIFA.

characters.name: Mick Moon
characters.description: Marc Snuffy's best friend and one of his teammates in the past. Snuffy and Mick had set themselves the dream and goal of winning the 5 major European championships. ~!Mick eventually died by suicide. His body was found by Snuffy, who decided to continue Mick's dream and make it a reality after his death.!~

characters.name: Atsuto Tereasa
characters.description: Japanese football sportscaster. He commented on the match between Blue Lock Eleven and Japan U-20.

characters.name: Harutarou Natsuki
characters.description: Japanese football sportscaster. He commented on the match between Blue Lock Eleven and Japan U-20.

characters.name: Bunny Iglesias
alt_names: バニー・イグレシアス
characters.description:
__Height:__ 191 cm (6'3")

Bunny Iglesias is a U-20 forward from Spain who plays for FC Barcha. ~!He is a member of the New Generation World XI.!~

characters.name: Tomonari Tada
characters.description: Tomonari Tada is a forward for Ichinan High School. ~!In the Saitama prefecture finals, he missed a clear goal after receiving a pass from teammate Yoichi Isagi, leading to a counterattack and a 0–2 loss that kept them out of the nationals. This failure was a turning point that pushed Isagi to join the Blue Lock Project.!~

characters.name: Onazi
characters.description: Onazi is a Nigerian U-20 forward.

characters.name: Bello
characters.description: Bero is a Nigerian U-20 right midfielder.

characters.name: Kuso
characters.description: Kuso is a Nigerian U-20 offensive midfielder and the team captain.

characters.name: Oboabona
characters.description: Oboabona is a Nigerian U-20 defender.

characters.name: Hugo
characters.description: Hugo is a U-20 player from France. ~!He is a member of the New Generation World XI.!~

characters.name: Haneru Shindo
characters.description: Haneru Shindo is an offensive player in the Dutch League 2nd Division, playing for A.A.A. ~!He is a member of Blue Lock’s B-Side project, personally selected by Buratsuta.!~

characters.name: Erik Gesner
characters.description: Erik Gesner is a U-20 forward from Germany who plays for Bastard München during the Neo Egoist League.

characters.name: Agbim
characters.description: Agbim is the Nigerian U-20 goalkeeper.

characters.name: Girolan Dabadie
alt_names: ジローラン・ダバディ
characters.description: [Sae Itoshi](https://anilist.co/character/169397/Sae-Itoshi)'s manager

characters.name: Ganbari
characters.description: Ganbari is the coach of the Nigerian U-20 national team.

characters.name: Shigeo Mizuki
characters.description: Shigeo Mizuki is a contender of Blue Lock’s B-Side project, personally selected by Buratsuta.
